name: Witch Please!
storyline:
Thanks to a minor magical mishap, ten-year-old Petra is the new Head Witch of Fenloft Academy! Too bad she doesn’t know anything about magic… or running a school.

It’s your job to help Petra navigate this new life, but it won’t be easy. There are classes to attend, skills to train, a sprawling campus to explore, and secrets to uncover… all while juggling Head Witch duties, too!

Petra might not be particularly talented, but she's pure of heart and determined to get things right. Whether it’s balancing the school budget or saving her friends from lurking dark magic, one thing’s for certain - it’s going to be an interesting year.

Witch Please is a charming visual novel which requires you to boost skills, strategize, and make smart choices as you explore its branching paths. It features an original soundtrack, gorgeous artwork, and tons of delightful characters to interact with!
summary: Help Petra navigate her new life as Head Witch of Fenloft Academy! Juggle classes, train skills, make friends, and solve mysteries in this charming choose-your-own-adventure-style visual novel.
